subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Monaco and Potito Starace advanced to the final of the Austrian Open yesterday in Kitzbühel. Monaco beat 11th-seeded Fernando Verdasco, 7-5, 7-5, while Starace upset the defending champion, Agustin Calleri, 6-4, 7-5, in the semifinals.The fifth-seeded Monaco is going for his third career title. The 10th-seeded Starace will be trying for his first tournament victory. “This is an unbelievable success for me,” Starace said. “I did not expect to beat Calleri, but my serve went really well and gave me a lot of confidence.”.
